TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi AssemblyInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用来获取应用程序信息（如版本号、说明、加载的程序集等）的属性。

span.span: Provides properties for getting the information about the application, such as the version number, description, loaded assemblies, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开的属性的一些`My.Application.Info`对象返回应用程序的程序集信息。Some of the properties exposed by the `My.Application.Info` object return the application's assembly information. 若要在应用程序的程序集设置的信息，必须使用**程序集信息**对话框中，可通过访问**应用程序**窗格**项目设计器**.To set the information in the application's assembly, you must use the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**. `My.Application.Info`对象提供类似于功能类，但范围以便快速访问最常见属性。The `My.Application.Info` object provides functionality similar to the class but is scoped to give quick access to the most common properties. 其他属性，如`LoadedAssemblies`，提供对应用程序的当前状态的访问。Other properties, such as `LoadedAssemblies`, provide access to the current state of the application. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.Version`属性来显示版本的应用程序。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Version` property to display the version of the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssemblyName As String
public: property System::String ^ AssemblyName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取应用程序的程序集文件的名称（不含扩展名）。

span.span: Gets the name, without the extension, of the assembly file for the application.
A containing the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName`属性获取包含清单的文件的名称。The `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName` property gets the name of the file containing the manifest. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.AssemblyName`属性来显示应用程序的名称。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.AssemblyName` property to display the name of the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.CompanyName`属性获取与该应用程序关联的公司名称。The `My.Application.Info.CompanyName` property gets the company name associated with the application. 可以通过更改的值更改公司名称**公司**中**程序集信息**对话框中，可通过访问**应用程序**窗格**项目设计器**。You can change the company name by changing the value for **Company** in the **Assembly Information** dialog box, accessible from the **Application** pane of the **Project Designer**. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.CompanyName`属性来显示与该应用程序关联的公司名称。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.CompanyName` property to display the company name associated with the application. Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StackTrace As String
public: property System::String ^ StackTrace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前的堆栈跟踪信息。

span.span: Gets the current stack-trace information.

value.span: 一个 值，包含当前的堆栈跟踪信息。

span.span: A containing the current stack-trace information.
The return value can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Info.StackTrace`属性列表中按时间顺序逆序方法调用 — 即，它描述了最新的方法调用前，并且列出了单独的行上的堆栈每个方法调用。The `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property lists method calls in reverse chronological order—that is, it describes the most recent method call first, and it lists each method call on the stack on a separate line. 但是，`My.Application.Info.StackTrace`属性可能不报告任意多个方法调用按预期运行，由于优化期间发生代码转换。However, the `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property might not report as many method calls as expected, due to code transformations that occur during optimization. 通常情况下，堆栈跟踪信息用于调试应用程序。Typically, the stack-trace information is used for debugging applications. 每个方法调用的堆栈跟踪信息的格式如下：The stack-trace information for each method call is formatted as follows: "在*FullClassName*。*MethodName*(*MethodParams*) 中*FileName*： 行*LineNumber* ""at *FullClassName*.*MethodName*(*MethodParams*) in *FileName*:line *LineNumber* " "At"文字加三个空格和文本"in"和": 行"如果调试符号不能省略。The literal "at" is preceded by three spaces, and the literals "in" and ":line" are omitted if debug symbols are not available. 将占位符`FullClassName`， `MethodName`， `MethodParams`， `FileName`，和`LineNumber`将替换为实际值，定义，如下所示：The placeholders `FullClassName`, `MethodName`, `MethodParams`, `FileName`, and `LineNumber` are replaced by actual values, defined as follows: |部件Part|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |*FullClassName**FullClassName*|类，包括命名空间的完整名称。The full name of the class, including the namespace.| |*方法名称**MethodName*|方法的名称。The name of the method.| |*MethodParams**MethodParams*|参数类型/名称对的列表。The list of parameter type/name pairs. 每个对由逗号 （，） 隔开。Each pair is separated by a comma (,). 如果省略此信息*MethodName*具有零参数。This information is omitted if *MethodName* takes zero parameters.| |*FileName**FileName*|文件的源的名称，其中*MethodName*方法声明。The name of the source file where the *MethodName* method is declared. 如果调试符号不可用，则省略此信息。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available.| |*LineNumber**LineNumber*|中的行数*文件名*，其中包含从源代码*MethodName*是调用堆栈上的指令。The number of the line in *FileName* that contains the source code from *MethodName* for the instruction that is on the call stack. 如果调试符号不可用，则省略此信息。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available.| `My.Applicaiton.Info.StackTrace`属性提供的功能类似于属性。The `My.Applicaiton.Info.StackTrace` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.StackTrace`属性来显示执行的代码的点的应用程序的堆栈跟踪。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.StackTrace` property to display the stack trace of the application from the point at which the code executes. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#27)]

exception.span: 请求的堆栈跟踪信息超出范围。

span.span: The requested stack-trace information is out of range.
